{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01711v1", "title": "Exact Borel subalgebras of tensor algebras of quasi-hereditary algebras", "summary": "Given two quasi-hereditary algebras, their tensor product is
quasi-hereditary. In this article, we show that given two exact Borel
subalgebras for these quasi-hereditary algebras, their tensor product is an
exact Borel subalgebra. Moreover, we describe in which cases the tensor product
of two regular exact Borel subalgebras is again regular. Additionally, we
investigate tensor algebras of generalised species of quasi-hereditary algebras
and exact Borel subalgebras thereof.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT", "published": "2025-04-02T13:19:57Z"}
